cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Financial Services on April 21, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2123, Diversity and Inclusion Data Accountability and Transparency Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 54 (Tuesday, March 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. BEATTY:
H.R. 2123.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H1621]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 264.

title: Diversity and Inclusion Data Accountability and Transparency Act of 2021
